name: Serif Health
headline: Healthcare Price Transparency APIs and Data Products
description:
At Serif Health, we are taking the complexity out of the cost of healthcare. Our mission is to make healthcare pricing and contracting more transparent, easier to understand, fairer, and ultimately more affordable for all. New price transparency regulations have made a wealth of healthcare pricing and reimbursement data publicly available for the first time, but it is still extremely hard to ingest, organize, and actually use this data to understand the cost of care. That’s where we come in. Serif Health is building healthcare price intelligence data products and APIs to power the future of more transparent healthcare.

We are an early-stage, venture-backed startup with a small, collaborative team of healthcare experts, engineers, and designers. We are excited to add new team members motivated by our mission, passionate about making a difference in healthcare, and looking forward to learning and growing from the challenges we will face along the way!
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:health-tech; industry:analytics; industry:healthcare; industry:api; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Rafiq Ahmed, Founder

founders.name: Matthew Robben, Founder
founders.description: Early or first engineer / engineering manager at four different startups, two of which have IPO'd as unicorns (Dropbox and One Medical), one that sold to a unicorn, and one that just raised a Series B. Serif Health is my first time taking the founder leap.

generated_description:
**Serif Health: Simplifying Healthcare Price Transparency**

Founded in 2020 and part of the Y Combinator W22 batch, Serif Health is an early-stage startup based in Los Angeles, CA. With a dedicated team of six healthcare experts, engineers, and designers, their mission is simple yet ambitious: to revolutionize the way we understand healthcare pricing. 

In a landscape overwhelmed by recent price transparency regulations, Serif Health aims to sift through the complexities of healthcare costs, making pricing and contracting clearer and more accessible. They leverage a wealth of publicly available healthcare pricing data that is often hard to ingest and utilize effectively. That’s where Serif's innovative solutions come into play.

**What They Do**
Serif Health provides robust APIs and data products designed to help both startups and larger enterprises navigate the murky waters of healthcare pricing. Their platform offers tools that allow users to effortlessly access and comprehend vast amounts of data, including:

- **Signal**: A feature that simplifies searching for market rates, generating benchmarks, and comparing prices across the industry.
- **APIs**: These allow for seamless integration of price transparency data into existing systems.
- **Data Delivery**: Custom data sets can be delivered in various formats, tailored to client needs.

Currently, they process over 350 billion rates monthly from more than 200 commercial payers and 500 plans, ensuring clients have the most comprehensive, validated information at their fingertips.

**Client Testimonials**
Serif Health is already powering healthcare price transparency for over 100 providers, with enthusiastic feedback from clients. VP of Payer Partnerships at a behavioral health company hailed their platform as critical for securing favorable rates. Others noted the teamwork and adaptability of the Serif team, showcasing their commitment to client success and innovation.

**The Takeaway**
Serif Health isn't just another tech startup; they're tackling a core issue in the healthcare system—price transparency—with intelligence and creativity. If you're someone who believes in making healthcare fairer and more affordable, this young company might just be worth keeping an eye on. 

For more information, you can visit their website at [Serif Health](https://www.serifhealth.com).
